message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you can take advantage of it!

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10000? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not comfortable going down to $10000 just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11500. This is a fair compromise that still allows me to make a decent profit. Let me know if this works for you!

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I'd like to counter with an offer of $11000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product and my budget constraints. I look forward to your response.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, and I'm glad we're getting close to a deal. However, I'm still not comfortable going down to $11000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $11250. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me at this price. Let me know if this works for you!

Hello Alice, thank you for your latest offer. I appreciate your effort to accommodate my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $11000. I believe this is a reasonable price given the value of the product and my financial situation. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
